title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Water for Irrigation: Sources of water, utilization in various sectors, irrigation potential, and scope for further development and significant issues. Farm Water Delivery System and Control: Design of open channel and underground pipelines, water regulating and diversion structures. Measurement of Irrigation Water: Flow measurement in open channels and closed conduits. Irrigation Requirement: Measurement
